results.headline: Review: ‘The Happytime Murders’ Has Puppets as Nasty as the Rest of Us
results.summary_short: Melissa McCarthy and Elizabeth Banks are part of a human cast trading jokes, bullets and bodily fluids with anthropomorphic, felt-covered toys.

results.headline: Review: In ‘The Rest I Make Up,’ a Playwright’s Life as Memories Ebb
results.summary_short: The documentary charts the career of María Irene Fornés, and follows her as Alzheimer’s steals her memories.

results.headline: Review: ‘John McEnroe’ Captures a Perfectly Imperfect Tennis Star

results.headline: Review: In ‘Mile 22,’ Mark Wahlberg, Patriotism and Paranoia

results.headline: Review: In ‘Skate Kitchen,’ a Tight-Knit Group of Girls Takes In a Newcomer
